extendedInfo.description: Celebrate the wonders of Christmas - in true 3-D!The creators of your favorite Live Wallpapers are delighted to bring you another 3D Live wallpaper especially for Christmas. Celebrate the Holidays every time you use your device, in true 3-D!Christmas Under water Live wallpaper is a beautiful live wallpaper which has a rippling effect when you touch the screen. This wonderful app is available for free in the android market. It's very interactive. With finger touch you create a water's ripple effect...you see the result effect!Christmas is the vacation time of the year when when we prepare our shopping lists, prepare fireplace, exchange gifts (esp. photo frames), crack jokes, sing songs and music and eagerly await for Santa Claus his elfs and reindeers.Features:1. Awesome background image3. Excellent 3D ripples effect4. Extremely user friendly5. Takes up very little battery juiceand ITS ABSOLUTELY FREE!! with every feature unlocked...Isn't this great guys?This wallpaper is true 3-D with hand-crafted work. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life.Works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers.Enjoy folks and spend the the upcoming month of love with your true love. Be it kids or adults everybody loves this awesome app. If you are looking for a app with coolest graphics, less battery consumption and free features, this is surely a Santa's treat.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (push notification or other) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!We wish you a merry Christmas and a very very happy new year

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: What an effect. Awesome. Feels great on my  phone
reviews.author: Ashish Prasad

reviews.title: Amazing work
reviews.comment: I love this app. Under water Animation is awesome. I have shown this app to my friends and family members and they just love it. Keep doing the great work. Gave rating also.
reviews.author: Mukund Prasad

reviews.title: Ummm...not that impressive
reviews.comment: I have use koi live and the water effect is much better. It allows for a dragging this not so much. Also the background is one single image. And the water is more of a raindrop effect. Unloaded
reviews.author: Brandi Barbee
